sentences.sContent: The restaurant is fully booked this evening.
Elisa has not fully recovered from the incident.
sentences.sCn: 埃莉莎还没有完全从这个事件中恢复过来。

sentences.sContent: I am fully aware of your problems.
The changes in policy are fully described in the review.
sentences.sCn: 政策的变化在报告中有全面的描述。

sentences.sContent: I fully accept that what he says is true.
sentences.sCn: 我完全同意，他的话属实。

sentences.sContent: This concept is discussed more fully in Chapter 9.
sentences.sCn: 这一概念在第九章中有更详细的论述。

words.tran: 完全的，完整的；满的，充满的；丰富的；完美的；丰满的；详尽的
